name: agentient-frontend-state-forms
description: Comprehensive state management with Zustand 5.0.2+ and form handling with React Hook Form 7.x + Zod 4.1.12+ for Next.js 14+ applications. Enforces the Type Inference Chain pattern: Zod schema → z.infer<typeof> → React Hook Form → Zustand store types for absolute type safety across the data layer.
